mapper.insert: insert into teacher (id, name, email, phone, address_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, name, email, phone, address_id from teacher
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (tutor_id, name, email, phone, addr_id) values (#{tutorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select tutor_id, name, email, phone, addr_id from teacher
